source.name: Department of Veterans Affairs Directives
source.description: The Department of Veterans Affairs delivers benefits and medical care services to Veterans and their families. VA uses directives, policies, handbooks, and memoranda to ensure delivery of benefits and care is consistent across VA. This tool is used to find directives, policies, handbooks, and memoranda.
